In Paris, UK's Cameron to call for stronger European coordination on GazaBritish foreign minister David Cameron will call for increased coordination between allies to address the "desperate" humanitarian situation in Gaza during a visit to Paris and Rome on Tuesday, his office said. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 00:07:00 GMT KA2NLACCMRP4FM5646RFN4IYN4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/paris-uks-cameron-call-stronger-european-coordination-gaza-2023-12-19/Reuters世界欧洲
White House plans one more Ukraine aid package, then up to CongressPresident Joe Biden is planning one more military aid package in December for Ukraine in its war against Russia, the White House said on Monday, then further assistance to Kyiv will require an agreement in Congress where prospects for a deal were uncertain. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 00:04:30 GMT B2CZZ6SOUFNSZLTRDNQFSRV3XM https://www.reuters.com/world/us/white-house-plans-one-more-ukraine-aid-package-then-up-congress-2023-12-19/Reuters世界美国
Joint patrols to guard ships in response to attacks by Houthis backing PalestiniansSeveral countries have agreed to jointly carry out patrols in the southern Red Sea and Gulf of Aden to try to safeguard commercial shipping against attacks by Yemen's Houthi rebels, who say they are supporting Palestinians under siege by Israel in the Gaza Strip. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 23:52:02 GMT 6NF7X2O6IZIPNM64HF7XN7DDNI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/joint-patrols-guard-ships-response-attacks-by-houthis-backing-palestinians-2023-12-18/Bassam Masoud, Phil Stewart, James Mackenzie世界中东
Australians assess flood damages from cyclone as rescue efforts ramp upResidents in Australia's northeast on Tuesday took stock of flood damages from former Tropical Cyclone Jasper and authorities accelerated efforts to rescue people stranded in remote towns as rivers stayed above dangerous levels. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 22:51:45 GMT X66NO234LVO75H44RGWW6IRQDE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australians-assess-flood-damages-cyclone-rescue-efforts-ramp-up-2023-12-18/Renju Jose世界亚太地区
North Korea says Hwasong-18 ICBM drill was response to U.S. hostilityNorth Korea said on Tuesday it had launched a Hwasong-18 intercontinental ballistic missile (ICBM) on Monday as a drill to confirm the war readiness of its nuclear deterrence force in the face of mounting hostility by the United States. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 22:51:13 GMT KB266J5RLJNZZF6MN5K7E3E6ZE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-says-it-conducted-hwasong-18-icbm-monday-yonhap-2023-12-18/Jack Kim世界亚太地区
Iceland volcano erupts after weeks of quake activityThe Reykjanes volcano in southwest Iceland erupted on Monday, spewing lava and smoke into the air, after weeks of intense earthquake activity, the country's Meteorological Office said. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 22:48:16 GMT ZMXKCQ5AGFNSTEOYCV62ZIVMPE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/iceland-volcano-erupts-after-weeks-quake-activity-2023-12-18/Reuters世界欧洲
US launches new multinational operation to safeguard Red Sea commerceU.S. Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin on Tuesday announced the creation of a multinational operation to safeguard commerce in the Red Sea following a series of missile and drone attacks by Yemen's Iran-aligned Houthis. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 22:34:39 GMT SQCWCA3E6ZJTHDRUZQGZYT4ETA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-launches-new-multinational-operation-safeguard-red-sea-commerce-2023-12-18/Phil Stewart世界中东
Trump's million dollar expert 'lost all credibility,' judge in NY civil fraud trial saysAn expert witness paid nearly $1 million by Donald Trump to testify at his New York civil fraud trial "lost all credibility" by "doggedly" justifying the former U.S. president's business records, the judge overseeing the case said on Monday. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 22:31:33 GMT VZ6B5PJ5ZNIJHHBW72WRAOL5NA https://www.reuters.com/legal/trumps-million-dollar-expert-lost-all-credibility-judge-ny-civil-fraud-trial-2023-12-18/Luc Cohen合法的
Moody's and Fitch say Chile's polarization, social demands persist after constitution voteA vote in Chile to reject a new constitution on Sunday reduced regulatory uncertainty but does not resolve social discontent or political divisions, rating agencies said on Monday. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 22:20:20 GMT CUVNGVSPAJKNVMV5GQLJFT5ZTI https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/moodys-fitch-say-chiles-polarization-social-demands-persist-after-constitution-2023-12-18/Reuters世界美洲
Texas to arrest migrants crossing border illegally under new state lawTexas Governor Greg Abbott on Monday signed a law allowing state law enforcement to arrest people suspected of crossing the U.S.-Mexico border illegally, giving local officers powers long delegated to the U.S. government in a move likely to trigger legal challenges. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 19:44:48 GMT UGU6LEOFWVN3FNS7KPVZO2XUTY https://www.reuters.com/world/us/texas-arrest-migrants-crossing-border-illegally-under-new-state-law-2023-12-18/Ted Hesson世界美国
Israel shipping costs rising as lines pull out and Red Sea attacks worsenThe cost of shipping goods to Israel by sea has risen in recent days as some container lines pull out while others impose new surcharges, adding to the country's supply chain pressures amid its war in Gaza, shipping sources said. Mon, 18 Dec 2023 18:52:21 GMT TNBF5OO5XFPA5N4XNLWLWVFFLY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-shipping-costs-rising-lines-pull-out-red-sea-attacks-worsen-2023-12-18/Jonathan Saul世界中东
